text: Club Deportivo Gerena is a Spanish football team based in Gerena, Seville, in the autonomous community of Andalusia. Founded in 2006, it plays in Tercera División – Group 10, holding home matches at Estadio José Juan Romero Gil. ==Season to season== {| |valign="top" width=0%| {| class="wikitable" |-
